pkgmetadata.longdescription:
This package offers an alternative to @<https://hackage.haskell.org/package/beam-migrate beam-migrate>@ and can be used to migrate a database between different versions of a Haskell schema. It doesn't depend on @beam-migrate@ if not transitively (@beam-postgres@ depends on it, for example).
<<https://i.imgur.com/xuPyUfg.gif>>
